data.text:
@SoraKingdomKey3 Hey I know we let this conversation die sorta but I just thought of this:

In the first few episodes of Eva, I felt pretty much the same way I do about Darling in the Franxx. Just because a show starts in a not-so-amazing way doesn’t mean it has no potential, and i see potential.

@HarveeTrademark My dude every other Trigger show I've seen has wowed me in the first episode alone, Darling In The FranXX didn't capture a fraction of that in 2 episodes so I'm not gonna waste my time with that

Also if A-1 wasn't helping the show would be A LOT better, believe me

@SoraKingdomKey3 >Bad
>Not even finished yet and also by Trigger

Pick one

Also, don’t saying EVERYTHING A-1 makes is bad. Sure, there’s some hot garbage, but you gotta rake in the cash somehow
@HarveeTrademark IT'S BAD IT'S A COLLABORATION WITH A-1 PICTURES AND THEY RUINED IT IT'S NOT HARD TO PIECE TOGETHER https://t.co/17dkDjdCvr
@HarveeTrademark Over what it's bad and I know it's bad https://t.co/6kQMP3x09G
@HarveeTrademark That's a great question I just hope she's not watching Darling In The FranXX of all things though LOL

@SoraKingdomKey3 More importantly

Does Kim Kardashian watch anime or did she just happen upon that image of Zero Two? 🤔

@SoraKingdomKey3 Inb4 anime becomes mainstream because of Kim Kardashian and millions of people with bad taste start making bad anime popular, thus obliterating good anime and the original anime fans have to rewatch pre-2019 shows forever
